name: Space Criminals (CodesAndStuff222)
description: This is a quick project that I made for the Game Dev Community Discord Jam.  It is called Space Criminals(*the s in criminals is silent*).  You use [WASD](*the s in wasd is silent*) to navigate the ship to steal some gems in order to progress between levels.  You will have to avoid touching everything around you to make sure that your ship doesn't explode because the ship is so fragile that the slightest bump will cause you and the ship to go up in flames.  Good Luck!!
